name: Easy social bookmark
author: ifourtechnolab

sections.description: “Easy social bookmark” is pure JavaScript based sharing WordPress plugin that helps visitors to share a specific page or product with their contacts or followers. It minimizes time taken to share any page on social media by directly sharing on website. User does not require open website first to share page or product data. Free sharing app is easy to implement and increases traffic and engagement on your site.
sections.faq:
1. Is this plugin Configure from Admin-side ?
    Yes.- Admin can configure this plugin from control-panel
  2. Is it free ?
    Yes.- Easy social bookmarks is free for all users.

Installation Instructions

  1. Upload easy-social-bookmarks.zip file in you /wp-content/plugins/ directory and unzip it.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go To Easy social bookmarks page and Configure setting as your wish.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Easy social bookmarks is ready for production
